column4: I'm having issues with blurry fonts on a fresh install of 8.04.  I tried many suggestions in forums and via google, but nothing seems to help.  Video card is Nvidia GeForce 6100.  Installed Proprietary driver via hardware drivers.
Most notible font issues are with firefox 3 and Xterm
do you have a screenshot for us?
I can take one, but where should I post it?
